Get available experiments information for the selected compendium, use get_compendia to check all the available compendia

get_experiments.Rd

Get available experiments information for the selected compendium, use get_compendia to check all the available compendia

get_experiments(compendium = "vitis_vinifera")

Arguments

compendium

a character - the selected compendium

Value

a data.frame

Examples

get_experiments()
#>           organism experimentAccessId
